member.name: WICTiffCompressionOption
member.summary: Specifies the Tagged Image File Format (TIFF) compression options.

member.name: WICTiffCompressionOption.WICTiffCompressionDontCare
member.summary: Indicates a suitable compression algorithm based on the image and pixel format.

member.name: WICTiffCompressionOption.WICTiffCompressionCCITT3
member.summary: Indicates a CCITT3 compression algorithm. This algorithm is only valid for 1bpp pixel formats.

member.name: WICTiffCompressionOption.WICTiffCompressionCCITT4
member.summary: Indicates a CCITT4 compression algorithm. This algorithm is only valid for 1bpp pixel formats.

member.name: WICTiffCompressionOption.WICTiffCompressionRLE
member.summary: Indicates a RLE compression algorithm. This algorithm is only valid for 1bpp pixel formats.
